title: Valid Palindrome
description: A phrase is a palindrome if, after converting all uppercase letters into lowercase letters and removing all non-alphanumeric characters, it reads the same forward and backward.

tests.input: A man, a plan, a canal: Panama

title: Majority Element
description: Given an array nums of size n, return the majority element.

title: Contains Duplicate
description: Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice.

title: Longest Palindrome
description: Return the length of the longest palindrome that can be built with the letters of a string.

title: Climbing Stairs
description: In how many distinct ways can you climb to the top?
